amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate that Congress should make permanent the tax incentives to make education more affordable and more accessible for American families and eliminate wasteful spending, such as spending on unnecessary tax loopholes, in order to fully offset the cost of such incentives and avoid forcing taxpayers to pay substantially more interest to foreign creditors.

vote.text: Amendment SA 206 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 90 - 0. Record Vote Number: 29.
